original: 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba /
translated: The dedication of the roots of virtue of the Recitation of Mañjuśrī's Name

original: mkhas pa rang gi bsngo ba dang / mi mkhas pa gzhan gyi bsngo ba'o //
analyzed: mkhas pa rang gi bsngo ba dang / mi mkhas pa gzhan gyi bsngo ba'o //
translated: The wise person's own dedication and the unwise person's dedication to others.

original: de la mkhas pa rang gi bsngo ba ni mi dmigs pa gsum gyis zin pas 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bsngo ba'o //
analyzed: de la mkhas pa rang gi bsngo ba ni mi dmigs pa gsum gyis zin pas 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bsngo ba'o //
translated: Among them, the wise person's own dedication is the dedication that is completely pure of the three spheres, embraced by the three non-apprehensions.

original: mi mkhas pa gzhan gyi bsngo ba ni dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar bsngo ba ltar bdag gis kyang bsngo ba'o //
analyzed: mi mkhas pa gzhan gyi bsngo ba ni dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar bsngo ba ltar bdag gis kyang bsngo ba'o //
translated: The unwise person's dedication to others is the dedication just as the Tathāgatas of the three times dedicate.

original: @22b mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba //
analyzed: @22b mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba //
translated: The dedication of the roots of virtue of the Recitation of Mañjuśrī's Name

original: slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: Composed by Master Mañjuśrīmitra is complete.
